column1: English Sent: The altitudinal variations are greater in the eastern half than those in the western half.
Hindi Tansl: paScimI BAga kI apekRA pUrvI BAga kI UzcAI meM aXika viviXawA pAI jAwI hE.
Anu Translation:  altitudinal parivarwana paScimI arXAMSa meM vaha kI apekRA pUrvI arXAMSa meM aXika acCe hEM
